item.title: es删除索引
item.author: 池鱼
item.description: 删除指定索引 1 2 3 # curl -XDELETE -u elastic:changeme http://localhost:9200/acc-apply-2018.08.09 {"acknowledged":true} 删除多个指定索引 1 2 # 中间用逗号分隔 # curl -XDELETE -u elastic:changeme http://localhost:9200/acc-apply-2018.08.09,acc-apply-2018.08.10 模糊匹配删除 1 2 3 # curl -XDELETE -u elastic:changeme http://localhost:9200/acc-apply-* {"acknowledged":true} 删除所有的索引 1 2 curl -XDELETE http://localhost:9200/_all 或 curl
